events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on March 30th at the downtown intersection, resulting in significant damage.
The claim was assessed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured's car in the crash.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the customer's case and to further assist with next steps.
The insurer acknowledged the claim and informed the customer about the claims process and expected timelines.
Customer was requested to submit the accident report, driver’s license, vehicle registration, and photos of damages.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents including police report and detailed pictures of the vehicle collision.
An investigation has been initiated to verify the circumstances surrounding the auto accident and assess liability.
Investigation has been completed confirming the insured was not at fault in the vehicle collision that took place.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover repair costs and any additional expenses due to the car accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and the settlement proposal provided.
The claim was officially approved following the customer’s agreement on the proposed settlement amount.
Insurance payment was processed and issued to the customer’s account to cover the repair of their damaged vehicle.
The claim has been successfully closed after full payment and resolution of all outstanding issues.
All claim records and documents have been archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
